content.en: Cloud resource optimization: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve resource allocation and maximize revenue in cloud computing environments. These algorithms include auction mechanisms, combinatorial double auction models, fitness-enabled auction algorithms, reverse auction mechanisms, and online auction mechanisms. The goal is to optimize the allocation of cloud resources, balance the interests between users and providers, and improve the efficiency and profitability of cloud services.
content.da: Optimering af cloudressourcer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ressourceallokering og maksimere indtægterne i cloud computing-miljøer. Disse algoritmer omfatter auktionsmekanismer, kombinationsdobbeltauktionsmodeller, fitness-aktiverede auktionsalgoritmer, omvendte auktionsmekanismer og online auktionsmekanismer. Målet er at optimere allokeringen af cloudressourcer, balancere interesserne mellem brugere og udbydere og forbedre effektiviteten og rentabiliteten af cloudtjenester.
